text: Poggle the Lesser was the Archduke of Geonosis and a prominent Separatist leader during the Clone Wars. A cunning and ambitious Geonosian, Poggle played a critical role in the formation of the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the early stages of the Clone Wars, including overseeing the construction of key weapons for the Separatist cause. Category:Star Wars characters Category:Fictional characters
title: Poggle the Lesser
